page.title: 15The Day in the Life of......
page.content: I wake up at about{9:00am,}get up and have breakfast.I go outside at { {9:30am}and go up to my friends house and we will go outside on our go-cart or skateboard and sometimes we go into {Falmouth}to look around and if the weather is not too good we would go to the{New Inn}in{Mabe}to play pool.In the afternoon I go into for dinner at {1:00pm.}After that we usually play cricket or football until about { {6:00pm }which is when we go in,I watch television until about {6:30pm}when my Mum or Dad will go to the fish & chip shop to get our tea.In the evening we either go to a club such as{Penryn {Athletic Football Club}or stay at home and either play scrabble or watch television.I would most probably play on the computer until {9:00-9:30pm} which is when I go to bed.
